# ssidPrefix

**Instance Property**

The string used to match networks against a known SSID prefix.

## Declaration

```swift
var ssidPrefix: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is only populated for configuration instances initialized with SSID prefix strings. The property is an empty string if the configuration instance has a full [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotConfiguration/ssid].

## Accessing configuration properties

- **ssid**: The SSID of an open, WEP, WPA/WPA2 personal, or WPA/WPA2 enterprise Wi-Fi network.
- **lifeTimeInDays**: The number of days the network retains the associated configuration.
- **joinOnce**: Restricts the lifetime of a configuration to the operating status of the app that created it.
- **hidden**: A Boolean value that indicates the visibility of the SSID.
